queue_url: will be automatically set by the mailer at runtime using the Lambda environment variable
from_address: will be automatically set by the mailer at runtime using the Lambda environment variable
role: will be automatically set by the mailer at runtime using the Lambda environment variable
slack_token: will be overwriten by the mailer at runtime with value read from secrets manager
mongodb_uri: will be overwriten by the mailer at runtime with value read from secrets manager
